Deals and Sales

Sephora’s spring sale ends today: Shop the 60+ best deals now

How much you save depends on your membership tier.
March 22, 2024, 6:18 PM UTC / Updated April 15, 2024, 3:49 PM UTC
By Maria Cassano and Bianca Alvarez

Last call for beauty enthusiasts: Sephora’s spring sale ends today. The Sephora Savings Event is one of only a few sitewide sales the retailer has all year, so it’s a great time to stock up on your go-to cosmetics, treat yourself to a luxury beauty find or try out the latest viral beauty trend.

Similar to the retailer’s past sales, the extent of your savings depend on your rewards membership tier. Below, we lay out the key details for Sephora’s spring sale and  highlighted a few of our favorite products across beauty categories, including skin care and hair care. Keep in mind that stock availability is subject to change.

SKIP AHEAD Skin care | Lip care | Body care | Hair care | Tools & accessories

Frequently asked questions

The Sephora Savings Event typically only happens three times a year, and is specifically for Beauty Insiders. Dates and discounts differ depending on your membership tier, but starting April 5, 2024 select Beauty Insiders can use code YAYSAVE at checkout to get up to 20% off their favorite cosmetics, hair care and skin care products sitewide, plus 30% off all Sephora Collection items , however, some brands are excluded from the sale. You also cannot use Beauty Insider Cash or rewards in combination with the sale.

Starting on April 5, Rouge members (those who’ve spent over $1,000 at Sephora in the past year) get 20% off sitewide. VIB members (those who’ve spent over $350 in the past year) and Insider members (no minimum required) will need to wait until April 9 to get discounts, after which they’ll receive 15% off and 10% off respectively. That said, all Beauty Insider members of any tier can get 30% off Sephora Collection products starting April 5. The sale ends for all tier members on April 15.

Sephora’s Beauty Insider loyalty program lets shoppers earn points on purchases that they can then redeem for rewards. All members receive one point for every $1 spent. The Beauty Insider program is free to join, but in order to move up the ranks (and receive more perks), members will need to spend the specified amount on Sephora merchandise within a calendar year.

All Insider members get free standard shipping, the ability to turn points into Beauty Insider Cash and access to auto-replenish deliveries, among other perks including a birthday gift. The higher your tier, the more savings, points and samples you’ll receive. Regarding the upcoming sale, members can expect the following discounts:

  • Insider (no minimum required): 10% off sitewide from April 9 to April 15
  • VIB (spend $350 a year): 15% off sitewide from April 9 to April 15
  • Rouge (spend $1,000 a year): 20% off sitewide from April 5 to April 15
  • All members (free to join, no minimum required): 30% off Sephora Collection products from April 5 to April 15
